meanings.definition: Showing a pink or red color in the face, especially from embarrassment or shyness.
meanings.sent1: The blushing bride looked beautiful in her pink dress.
meanings.sent2: She felt her cheeks blushing when she received a compliment.
meanings.sent3: The blushing flower stood out among the green leaves.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky with blushing hues.
meanings.sent5: The blushing sky signaled the arrival of a new day.

meanings.definition: To become red in the face, especially from embarrassment or shyness.
meanings.sent1: He was blushing furiously after his mistake was pointed out.
meanings.sent2: She started blushing when he praised her cooking skills.
meanings.sent3: The cat caught stealing fish was blushing with guilt.
meanings.sent4: The old tree blushing with autumn colors stood tall in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The town was blushing with excitement for the upcoming festival.
